import { useState } from "react" const NewManga = (props) => { const [newManga, setNewManga] = useState({ title: '', image: '', link: '', totalChapters: null, currentChapters: null, }) const imageStandBy = (event) => { event.src = 'https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&url=https%3A%2F%2Fcommons.wikimedia.org%2Fwiki%2FFile%3ANo_Image_Available.jpg&psig=AOvVaw0bebsMsLN6Mo1PnQrgTCtz&ust=1678705181670000&source=images&cd=vfe&ved=0CA4QjRxqFwoTCPDws6Ge1v0CFQAAAAAdAAAAABAE' } return(
image}/>
) } export default NewManga
